text: Zafer Önen (1 January 1921 Çorum – 13 December 2013 Istanbul) was a Turkish movie actor. He was known for his roles in Curcuna (1955), My Wife's Lover (1959) and Flying Saucers Over Istanbul (1955). Önen died in Istanbul, Turkey from heart failure, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish television actors Category:Turkish voice actors
title: Zafer Önen
